title: Case Study Worksheet
description: Analyzes how a geographic feature or event ripples through the world, affecting sovereign powers, governments, alliances, trade, and naming. Used to stress-test worldbuilding consistency.

geographic_feature.description: The geographic feature or event being analyzed (e.g., a mountain range, a river, a volcanic eruption)

government_types.description: Government types involved and how geography influenced them

geography_influence.description: How the geographic feature shapes politics, culture, trade, and conflict

alliances.description: Alliances formed because of this feature

enmities.description: Conflicts or rivalries caused by this feature

trade_implications.description: How this feature affects trade routes, resources, and commerce

cultural_impact.description: How this feature influences cultures, traditions, and beliefs

naming_rationale.description: How names in the area reflect the geographic reality

historical_events.description: Key historical events tied to this feature

inconsistencies_found.description: Any worldbuilding inconsistencies discovered through this analysis

x-cross-references.history-entry: Historical events tied to the feature
